#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	ll t;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		ll n, i, res = 1, a;
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		for( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i++ )
		{
			scanf("%lld",&a);
			res = ( res * (a%mod) )%mod;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",res);
	}
	return 0;
}
